Title: Man In The Middle
Description: A cyberpunk themed action with puzzle and strategy elements. Made with XNA as part of a game development course at the IT University of Copenhagen by Bo Bendtsen, Jonas Flensbak, Daniel Kromand, Jess Rahbek & Darryl Woodford.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A cyberpunk themed action with puzzle and strategy elements. Made with XNA as part of a game development course at the IT University of Copenhagen by Bo Bendtsen, Jonas Flensbak, Daniel Kromand, Jess Rahbek & Darryl Woodford.

Cheat and hints
  • While in the menu screen, click RB to skip one level forward before clicking A to start the single player campagin. (1 click = level 2 and 2 clicks = level 3).
  • Level 3 hint: please note the links are only one-way. Pen and paper may be needed ;-) .
